column4: i think i might have changed the permissions of /bin/bash how would i go about fixing that?
i tried that, ill paste it really quick
i imagine your error is caused because one of the install scripts is trying to call /bin/bash - which isn't there
certainly worth a try -- you MIGHT even try linking dash to bash to test
you are brilliant, i linked it, then was able to install and everything was fine again, no errors, thanks
that might be a compiz limitation, you might want to also as in the #compiz channel.  good luck.
